item.description:
Hike the White Arrow trail to the summit. Just over 2 miles, warm up walking through old farm fields transitioning into some rock steps until you come to the bald summit area. Twards the top there are a few spots where you will need to use your hands as well but weather permitting the views can be lovely.
We can meet at the parking lot 116 Poole Road Jaffery NH, 03452 at 11:30 or if anyone would like a ride I will be at the Springfield VT exit 7 park and ride at 10:15 am. The NH Parks Dept charges 5 Dollars to hike. There are plenty of places to eat after as Monadnock is close to Keene.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike Mt. Monadnock
